remarks: A relationship between the order of a multiple and the order of the basepoint.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Sep-2015.)
statement:
odmulgid.1 $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
odmulgid.2 $e |- O = ( od ` G ) $.
odmulgid.3 $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
odmulgid $p |- ( ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X /\ N e. ZZ ) /\ K e. ZZ ) -> ( ( O ` ( N .x. A ) ) || K <-> ( O ` A ) || ( K x. N ) ) ) $.
